question: I often try new activities just for excitement.
I get bored quickly when things stay the same.
I like to make impulsive decisions sometimes.
I often worry about making mistakes.
I avoid taking risks even when the chance of success is good.
I tend to expect the worst to happen.
I feel happiest when I’m around people who appreciate me.
I am sensitive to what others think about me.
I try to help or please people to keep good relationships.
I keep working on a problem even when it’s very difficult.
I can stay focused on a long task until it’s done.
I rarely give up easily.
I usually take responsibility for my actions.
I have clear goals and work steadily toward them.
I can stay calm and think clearly in stressful times.
I enjoy helping others even when I get nothing in return.
I can forgive people easily.
I like working in a team rather than competing.
I often feel a deep connection with nature or the universe.
I believe everything happens for a reason.
I sometimes lose myself in creative or spiritual experiences.
